sentences.sentence: I expressed my commiserations on his tribulation.
sentences.translation: 我对他的磨难表示同情。

sentences.sentence: Save your commiserations and judges, look at the truth.
sentences.translation: 收起你们丫的同情和评价吧，看清事情的真相。

sentences.sentence: Save your commiserations and judges, look at the truth. Confess your fears and respect your rival China.
sentences.translation: 收起你们丫的同情和评价吧，看清事情的真相。承认你们的恐惧，尊重你们的对手-中国。
